author: mjohanm4
content:
Hey guys 2 questions - 
1) will statelessness / smaller states in nodes (DAS, block witnesses, zero state nodes) impact gas prices? If so, is it because gas refunds would stop?
2) will the Eth 1.x merge have Eth 1 chain continue proof of work until state execution? Or how will the existing chain continue processing transactions when rolled into the beacon chain

Many thanks
